pages.text: Research using the "I Reckon" method has shown that the energy contained within the $(item)Nether Star$() can fuse well with HUAJI power, leading to the creation of a whole new class of materialsâ€”the $(item)HUAJI Stars$().
"No matter the era, it is ordinary humans who shatter the stars."$(br)"The stars?" "It's nothing, just a thing of the past."$(br)(From afar, a cry is heard: Stella!!!)
